article.title: Acceptance of increments
article.label: Iteration Acceptance
article.intro: Read how every iteration you will be involved into scope verification and acceptance
article.description: Incremental delivery of product guarantees customer satisfaction
article.keywords: incremental delivery, requirements acceptance, iteration acceptance meeting, RUP iteration acceptance

text.p: [Incremental delivery](/process/communication/incremental) means that a software product is created, [tested](/process/quality) and delivered to you in a number of builds. Each build has a new portion of functionality. A new build is delivered by the end of each [Iteration](/process/time/iteration).

The Iteration Acceptance Meeting is an online meeting (20-40 minutes) where the project manager presents Iteration results and explains them. You review the results, and confirm what new functionality was accepted during Iteration (and what was not).
Typical agenda of Iteration Acceptance Meeting:

ul.li: What was the plan for Iteration
What was completed and accepted by the customer

text.p: The Iteration Acceptance Meeting is the most important activity because the project team receives your feedback about project results.

concepts.c1: Schedule is a coarse-grained project plan developed by the project manager
concepts.c2: Iteration is detailed project plan of one time frame
concepts.c3: Risks are communicated with you during the whole project lifecycle
